name: Mrs.Kasthuri Bai M
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Computer Science )  - Government College Of Technology, Bharathiyar University, Coimbatore   - 1992M.C.A  - Seethalakshmi Ramaswamy College, Bharathidasan University, Thrichirappalli   - 1995M.Phil  ( Computer Science )  - Periyar University  - 05/31/2007
in_brief: Mrs.Kasthuri Bai M   has over 15+ years of academic experience that has shown her the challenges and gratification of becoming a skilled instructor. She has mentored more than 100 under graduate and post graduate students in completing their projects. She is keen to learn new programming languages and technologies for solving problems.  She believes that the responsibility of a teacher is not only imparting knowledge ,  but ensuring  that students  develop  Honesty,  Enthusiasm for learning,  Ambition, Etiquette And Manners, Self esteem, Being kind and helpful.
